description: Returns information about workflow types in the specified domain. The results may be split into multiple pages that can be retrieved by making the call repeatedly. You can use IAM policies to control this action's access to Amazon SWF resources as follows: If the caller doesn't have sufficient permissions to invoke the action, or the parameter values fall outside the specified constraints, the action fails. The associated event attribute's cause parameter is set to OPERATION_NOT_PERMITTED. For details and example IAM policies, see Using IAM to Manage Access to Amazon SWF Workflows in the Amazon SWF Developer Guide.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain in which the workflow types have been registered.

parameters.name: registrationStatus
parameters.description: Specifies the registration status of the workflow types to list.

parameters.name: nextPageToken
parameters.description: If NextPageToken is returned there are more results available. The value of NextPageToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token will return a 400 error: ' Specified token has exceeded its maximum lifetime'. The configured maximumPageSize determines how many results can be returned in a single call.

nested_items.name: typeInfos
nested_items.description: The list of workflow type information.

nested_items.name: workflowType
nested_items.description: The workflow type this information is about.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow type.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the workflow type.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the workflow type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the type registered through  RegisterWorkflowType.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date when this type was registered.

nested_items.name: deprecationDate
nested_items.description: If the type is in deprecated state, then it is set to the date when the type was deprecated.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: If a NextPageToken was returned by a previous call, there are more results available. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token in nextPageToken. Keep all other arguments unchanged.
